plot: Ever fed a talking giraffe? Been sniffed by a chatting llama? Waddled alongside a pushy penguin? Animals from around the world get up-close and personal as never before in this hilarious one-of-a-kind DVD.
title: Here's Looking at You Kid
plot_es: Ever fed a talking giraffe? Been sniffed by a chatting llama? Waddled alongside a pushy penguin? Animals from around the world get up-close and personal as never before in this hilarious one-of-a-kind DVD.
plot_en: Ever fed a talking giraffe? Been sniffed by a chatting llama? Waddled alongside a pushy penguin? Animals from around the world get up-close and personal as never before in this hilarious one-of-a-kind DVD.
